messagebundle.msg: Get all good events in and around your location, embed it and more.

msg.desc: Default location label for user preferences settings.

msg.desc: Themes folder label for user preferences settings.

msg.desc: Label appended at the end with error message.

messagebundle.msg: did not match any volunteer opportunities.

msg.desc: While showing error message, to allow user to search again.

msg.desc: Error displayed when user has not enabled opensocial feature.

messagebundle.msg: This gadget lets you share and collaborate with friends on iGoogle. Please adjust the gadget's settings to use these features.

msg.name: sign_in_err
msg.desc: Error displayed when user is not signed in.

messagebundle.msg: This gadget lets you share and collaborate with friends on iGoogle. Sign in to use these features.

msg.name: shared
msg.desc: Tooltip of image to mark the news as shared.

msg.name: add_this
msg.desc: Label for link to share the gadget.

messagebundle.msg: Sharing this article will post to your friend's updates.

msg.name: limit_exceeds_err
msg.desc: Error displayed when quota of creating activity exceeds maximum limit.

messagebundle.msg: Daily maximum limit has been reached.

msg.name: activity_err
msg.desc: Error displayed when activity has not been shared.

messagebundle.msg: Error in sharing activity. Please adjust the gadget's settings to use share feature.

msg.desc: Message shown when user has no friends and some news or score has been shared.

msg.name: like_to_share
msg.desc: Confirmation text to share the information.
